snippet: Edicson Valderrama, who has traveled the world chaperoning fellow sojourners, fell behind on his bills when he was sidelined by cancer. He now hopes to start a school for aspiring guides.
abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, one of the seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Edicson Valderrama pay rent and renew his tour guide license after his battle with stomach cancer.
lead_paragraph: Edicson Valderrama, who has traveled the world chaperoning fellow sojourners, fell behind on his bills when he was sidelined by cancer. He now hopes to start a school for aspiring guides.

headline.main: After Cancer, Tour Guide Plans Next Destination
headline.print_headline: After Cancer, Tour Guide Plans Next Destination

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
